properties.address: Apex Church Community Hall, Aberdeenshire AB42 1TH AB42 3PJ
properties.description: warm space open once a week to provide soups and sandwiches and an open ear. All are welcome, no judgement here. Open 12-1.30 on a Wednesday all year. we also have a small food table with donated goods
properties.title: Apex Church Community Cafe

properties.description: Apex Community Cafe provides a warm meal every Wednesday, 12-1.15pm in Apex Church Hall, Peterhead.
properties.title: Apex Community Cafe

properties.description: Open from 11/01/2023. Come and have a chat and enjoy a hot drink with some fine piece's, and friendly faces. Food parcels available for those who need. Great space to build community, friendship and help.
properties.title: Catalyst Vineyard Peterhead Church

properties.description: A warm space with a free dinner for anyone in the community. Regardless of circumstances, everyone is welcome. Video games and toys for children. Space to charge electronic devices.
properties.title: Peterhead Baptist Church

properties.description: All are welcome to enjoy a warm space and a hot meal.
